name: For invalid instructions the API should give a 400 response

testSteps.description: 1: For invalid instructions the API should give a 400 response ({Instructions=AAAAAA})

children.description:
Given A room of dimension
| x | y |
| 1 | 1 |

And Set the initial position of the Hover to
| x | y |
| 0 | 0 |

And Set the dirt patches
| x | y |
| 0 | 0 |
And I set the instructions "AAAAAA"
When Send a POST request to "/cleaning-sessions"
POST
POST
Then Validate the response code is 400
